name: TamaMerge 2048 merge balls: number puzzle game
name_original: TamaMerge 2048 merge balls: number puzzle game
description:
2048 merge balls game , number puzzle game

How to play
Drag the screen to fire the ball. If the numbers are the same, 
they will merge! Aim for larger numbers!

WorldRanking
You can challenge the world ranking by downloading the smart phone version.

Other games are also introduced on my homepage
https://opa-ma.com/
